Review.Titre: Don’t waste your time with the surveys!
Review.Contenu: Don’t waste your time with the surveys! You might get rewarded for two out of every five you actually complete! They let you use your time to finish the survey, giving them all your input for them to sell to a third party(read the fine print), then they give you the excuse, “ We’re sorry, but we’ve had sufficient participants to make quota, but please don’t give up? Keep trying. Might get lucky!

Review.Titre: You have made a error and refuse to fix it.
Review.Contenu: I have been a loyal and responsible Toluna survey taker for nearly 15 years. One day, out of the blue, you cut me off from taking any surveys.  I still get invites and am able to take the 15 point sponsored surveys.  I have called you several times. Your response was something I never heard of.  My techie grandson looked into it a concluded you made an error and I have done nothing wrong.  I already knew that. What a shameful way to treat loyal consumers. Shame on you.  Mary Huggins

Review.Titre: Doesn't matter how many incentive…
Review.Contenu: Doesn't matter how many incentive surveys that I complete I am still not receiving any points. I am wasting 5 hours of time every day for 0 points. I will get that odd survey where I do complete and receive points. I am completing 3 surveys a day at least and get rewarded for completing 1 survey the most.

Review.Titre: One survey was too long and only…
Review.Contenu: One survey was too long and only offered 1000 points. It kept asking the same questions over and over. I fell asleep and eventually exited out of the survey. It was not worth it.I was in the middle of a survey, I hit next and it said I had already completed the survey. Another survey told me I did not qualify and I was more than halfway through and answered a lot of questions pertaining to the survey not just screener questions. What a waste of time. I should have received partial credit.

Review.Titre: Toluna - Not Worth Your Time.
Review.Contenu: I spent almost 3 weeks amassing 190,000 points to redeem through PayPal but it's been more than 2 weeks & I still haven't received my payment or any updates regarding it. The website says PayPal payment takes about 1-3 weeks, but I'm not sure I'll ever receive it though. I'll update this review if I ever do, but until then I would suggest people to not use Toluna, it's just a scam from my experience.

Review.Titre: PayPal Payment Processing is abysmal
Review.Contenu: PayPal Payment Processing is abysmal! It was annoying enough that they charge you a processing fee and only processed payments once a week, which used to be on Mondays with an occasional delay to Tuesday or Wednesday. Then it slid to Thursdays, irritating but at least it was still weekly. Since November it's gone completely downhill--they processed once for the whole month, and anything that has been submitted since then is still stuck in Pending. Tired of being quoted the "1-3 week" timeframe (which is BS since every other survey site does them instantly) and now they just keep making excuses about how they've had an overwhelming number of redemptions--blah, blah, blah! Get it together and get us paid in a timely manner--no more excuses.

Review.Titre: Broken Promises
Review.Contenu: I signed up to take surveys to earn points and make money, what's the point of taking surveys when everytime you take them there is a problem and I don't get my points because of an error in the survey.. so I hsve only taken one survey and the very first survey is broken.. nope fck this site!

Review.Titre: I've been using Toluna for a long time
Review.Contenu: I've been using Toluna for a long time, and it has always been good. I've successfully redeemed rewards several times. However, this morning, I suddenly can't log in for some unknown reason.【Error:Authentication failed. Please try again.】

Review.Titre: Toluna is a scam
Review.Contenu: What a company! Even 50 PayPal reward can’t pay to the users! How much time that users have put on the surveys and get the 50 dollars. It’s not easy! And you said you can’t transfer that 50 Hk dollars and that’s how you scam users to do the surveys for you over and over again?! There are surveys out there which are getting over 200 dollars within 2 hours! And they were paying by cash. How dare you to collect peoples’ opinion and sell them to the third party and let users reward nothing! I have also spent weeks on the surveys to get only 50 dollars. You’re literally a scam company!Pathetic!!!

Review.Titre: feels scammy
Review.Contenu: the first survey i completed i got all the way to the end and then it gave me an error timeout message, the second survey i spent 15 minutes on to be told they were looking for a different profile. very scammy.

Review.Titre: Seems like this is a very cleverly arranged SCAM!
Review.Contenu: You offer 10 000 points for completing 3 surveys in the first week - BUT - after I've only completed TWO proper surveys (with LOTS of your own meaningless mini surveys - you conveniently inform me "CAN YOU BELIEVE IT! WE ARE CURRENTLY OUT OF SURVEYS"with Points Balance Points: 7180!I'm guessing - since only payment only after $50 in points has accumulated has been mentioned - that that probably requires 50 000 points?With the surveys mostly only offering 1 000 points and running out of surveys, clearly this must be a SCAM where suckers answer lots of surveys that Toluna gets paid for - but when we eventually give up in frustration without ever being able to reach 50 000 points you have had free surveys answered that YOU get paid for - without having to actually pay most of your reviewers for wasting their time doing surveys for NOTHING!

Review.Titre: They sell your data in a scammy way
Review.Contenu: Toluna is the worst among all other research communities. They will sell your data to research companies, and get paid but will ban your account without warning and forfeit your reward as well as point. So, ultimately you won't be paid for your data. Besides, their reward takes a longer time to arrive (7 days to 10 days) than other sites. At this time if you get a ban, you will lose your account and the reward that you waiting for.   I earned 300k points, using this platform for the last 8 months, and got paid $75. But one morning suddenly they banned my account and forfeited my points which cost $16 of data by saying almost nothing specific. You have seen in the Trustpilot review they doing the same to a lot of users with the excuse of their terms and conditions. So the site is time-killing and doing scams is a smart way. please AVOID the site.

They even went to far by declining my rewards that was cashed out while my account was still active. I cant help it if i have a huge family and friend circle and i wanted them to also be part of the Toluna community. They were a very good company that always provided a great service to me but lately their services dropped. If you suspected i have many accounts why wait for 2 years and these suspected account can you prove that i have cashed out on one of them and secondly why decline rewards that has been valid when cashed out? Toluna is getting a 1 star just a pity there is no -10 starts cause thats what i will give them. Review.Contenu: Okay at first, but eventually they scammed me. I was paid a little here and there, but when I decided to save my points (95,0000) to redeem for $30 to Paypal, they never paid it. They let me continue doing surveys for two weeks, earning almost 40,000 more points, while I waited for payment. Then with no warning they locked me out and “suspended” my account unjustifiably. They said the account was flagged for “inconsistencies between the data provided in your account and the settings our system is detecting for the machine used to complete surveys; such as using an account in a way that does not match the country of registration.” This is complete garbage because I’m an average US user with an iPhone and no weird settings or anything. Plus I had already been doing surveys with no issues for probably over a month. Total waste of time!

I was supposed to get 1200 points for it but obviously I didn't get anything. The screen just blocked and that was that... Since this is not the first time it happened I am starting to believe there's something very well planned behind these "technical issues".... It's so frustrating considering that people do these surveys in good faith, trying to make a difference and that they expect to be paid as it should be. It's not like you are paying a lot but I guess if 500 people have "technical issues" exactly after answering the last question,so when the survey is completed,it adds up to 600000 points which is... what... about 5 euro???? But then if 1000 people go through the same thing... You see where I am going with this! It's just ridiculous going on disgusting. I am sorry for even giving you 1 star, but there is no option for 0 stars....

Review.Titre: Worst platform
Review.Contenu: There are many problems with your platform. First, the rewards they give are a pittance, especially compared to the other rewarded survey platforms. In the whole year I have gotten less than 20 dollars from you and I have completed too many long surveys for such a miserable reward that in addition to scoring few points for each one, I have to reach an extremely high score which takes more than six months to achieve. Secondly, sometimes you don't even add up the points, I am completing surveys and everything is fine until the moment when I have to look at my points total to see that even though I have completed the survey correctly, you don't deign to add up my points. Third, the surveys are almost never available, I know that not many of them fit my profile but it is strange that I am the only platform with these problems when in all of them it is almost always the same surveys. And when there is a survey as soon as I open it, it says that it is no longer available even though it appeared a few seconds ago. Finally, their roulette is designed to not even make us earn 10 points, if they will never give surveys at least improve their rewards roulette. It is the worst paid survey platform out there.

Review.Contenu: many time survey gets invalid after filling up the entire survey with the message " sorry this survey has been filled recently". simply wasting the time invested in filling up the survey.

Review.Titre: Despite my profile telling you I don't…

TOLUNA seems to be the most disorganized survey group I've dealt with. What few surveys come through aren't well written and force people to lie to continue through the survey. And as you should be aware when people are forced to select options they normally wouldn't select this skews the survey and the survey becomes invalid and untruthful.

Review.Titre: Most surveys are not a good match!!
Review.Contenu: I receive emails saying that a survey is waiting for me. However, when I try to access the surveys, they are rarely a good match -- apparently--, which is very frustrating. If you are interested in young people only, just say it and do not open an account when people who do not meet your age criteria or do not send them an email that will raise false hopes.

Review.Titre: I am disappointed with you
Review.Contenu: I am disappointed with you, Toluna. It has been over 6 weeks already and I still haven’t receive my points. And now, December 12, 2023, I finished two surveys but my points hasn’t been credited to my account yet. Do I need to wait for a year for the points to be credited on my account? And I don’t mean to sound rude or anything, but sometimes, the customer support is not even giving enough help or answer to the user of Toluna. They closed the tickets and marked as ‘solved’ without proper solution to the issue.

Review.Titre: Absolutely fed fed up of spending ages…
Review.Contenu: Absolutely fed up of spending ages answering survey and at the very end get message pop up saying oops sorry it's not you it's us,come back later,never get those points, Also far far too may points needed for rewards compared to other survey platforms

Review.Titre: It's very difficult to cash in your…
Review.Contenu: It's very difficult to cash in your rewards in fact I haven't managed to do it yet

Review.Titre: If you honestly answer you’re rejected
Review.Contenu: I go through the preliminaries and am then told I’m not what the survey is looking for.  I am rejected about twice as many times as I’m accepted.  I answer the questions honestly.

Review.Titre: The past three surveys I got an error…
Review.Contenu: The past three surveys I got an error message when I was almost done with them.

Review.Titre: Completion of entire surveys for no reward
Review.Contenu: I have been a member of Toluna for a couple of months. Over that time the one fault I keep getting is undertaking a survey which takes 15-20 minutes - It gets right up to the end when they then ask for personal details like age, salary bracket etc. The survey then concludes and when you press the last button - you get the Toluna page saying 'this survey just filled up heres 50 points'. It is just so wrong as the client has got all the data gathering and you've got nothing for your time. This has occurred now on several occasions and I feel very conned by this. When I contact customer service they just give a generic reply and don't really seem to grasp the issue. Ive had a couple of rewards but beginning to get very frustrated with this company and the fact that this keeps happening.

Review.Titre: I got ONE survey completed out of dozens
Review.Contenu: I got ONE survey completed out of what seemed like dozens of attempts in multiple hours. I feel like I'm wasting my time.

Review.Titre: On average I receive around 9 Toluna…
Review.Contenu: On average I receive around 9 Toluna Surveys per day, Of the 9 surveys I receive I would be very lucky for 1 of them to go through. This has been happening now for over a month. I have a better success rate with other Companies for Surveys.  Sorry

Review.Titre: I have to spend 5 minutes complete the…
Review.Contenu: I have to spend 5 minutes complete the same set of questions each time, to only then get rejected from the survey. Extremely annoying.

Review.Titre: You always get me survey that I don't…
Review.Contenu: You always get me survey that I don't qualify for

Review.Titre: I spend too much time answering questions that were not actually part of the survey
Review.Contenu: I spend too much time answering questions and then being told I do not qualify.I had two surveys today which quit and went back to the main page.  I may not have qualified for those either, however, that was never said.At least twice I clicked on the survey taps and got the main page again.I completed on survery and at the end was given an error message.Overall, I spent over an hour and actually completed and told I would get credit for one short survey.

Review.Titre: Not a great user expereince
Review.Contenu: Out of 4 surveys completed 2 failed at the end point showing an error message and there is no way of progressing or reporting the issue and this could be a huge time thief as it tends to be at the end of the surveys and this is where you would gain your points for your insight.

Review.Titre: Recent issue with the website
Review.Contenu: I always enjoyed using Toluna and I am thankful for the financial rewards received in exchange for giving our honest opinion. But recently, it is increasingly very difficult to login to my account although I keep trying multiple times. Also, the same is happening using either the Edge or Google browsers. Sometimes I am able to login but then the website crashes and logs me out.I made sure that VPN was off, but the same problem continued.Thank you Toluna once more and I hope this issue is sorted once and for all.

Review.Titre: Surveys give errors and don’t load on…
Review.Contenu: Surveys give errors and don’t load on my PC, but they work on my mobile phone.

Review.Titre: Emails not delivered to my primary…
Review.Contenu: Emails not delivered to my primary email addressSlow delivery of rewards.

Review.Titre: I get surveys that do not support my interests
Review.Contenu: I get surveys that do not support my interests. Cars, travel, alcohol, sports, cigarettes I don't do any. I also get multiple sending of the same survey. Many of my surveys also ask for my age, postal code and province multiple times over and over. Today was 4 times in a row on one survey.

Review.Titre: I don't qualify for very many surveys
Review.Contenu: I don't qualify for very many surveys.  I am a very active 67 who looks and acts like 55.    When put my age in the survey boom "thank you for time but we are looking for a different participant"  and a lesson on how to get picked.  I do write surveys that I take my time, write meaning full responses, and care about the surveys subject.

Review.Titre: Glitches in connectivity issues
Review.Contenu: Glitches in connectivity issues, repetitive questions within the same survey.modern day dumbos who think they're way clever but in real are just grist to the mill.

Review.Titre: The entire survey experience to be deceptive.
Review.Contenu: I find the entire survey experience to be deceptive and unsustainable.Participating in surveys seems to be a futile effort, as it often results in a significant waste of time. After dedicating a substantial amount of time to answering survey questions, the disappointing revelation is that one is frequently deemed ineligible for the survey. This recurrent pattern raises suspicions about the legitimacy of these survey platforms.It appears that these survey companies might be primarily engaged in data mining, leading to concerns about the potential misuse of personal information. The overall experience leaves one questioning the credibility and ethical practices of such survey provider.

Review.Titre: Surveys Already Full So Could Not Proceed Halfway Through
Review.Contenu: After answering a myriad of questions, suddenly the survey was full. This happened not just once, but many times. Please profile properly and direct your emails to the right groups of participants.

Review.Titre: Great when going well
Review.Contenu: Great when going well, my favourite survey site. But problems occur often. Currently can complete surveys but I'm not aloud to cash in any points. When questioned told it was a vpn which I donf know what that is or inconsistent answers. Also wrong I spend ages taking time to answer, just an excuse. I've emailed twice with no response. I'm currently doing a product trial for a well known company, I'm going go email them and let them know whats going on with the company they are using. Really quite upset as this is how I pay for anything for my children.

Review.Titre: Nice app
Review.Contenu: Nice app, but needs to improve more, should provide more surveys and should increase the referral limit, atleast upto 50-60 referrals per month

Review.Titre: I can't do the surveys
Review.Contenu: I can't do the surveys, i have tried to work with the customer service team but I always get there are no more surveys in which the response was my answers are inconsistent. I don't think many are but they get very repetitive after awhile. And to get enough point to redeem anything is a lot more time and effort than other survey platforms. I wish to donate the rest of my points to the Morocco donations and i am closing my account.

Review.Titre: Very Frustrating!
Review.Contenu: Sometimes answering the surveys is a waste of time as most of the time I dont even finish before there is an "error" message. Its very frustrating. Trying to get enough points is impossible when you cant even complete a survey. Wondering if I should just quit this before I waste anymore time. Oh, and the rewards can only be gotten when you complete surveys and if your not getting the points because of "errors" and to get a voucher is over a hundred thousand plus....well its almost impossible to earn anything.

Review.Titre: hard to qualify for the surveys
Ever since the transformation
Review.Contenu: Ever since the transformation, things have been different with the platform. I'm hoping for another revamp to make Toluna more user friendly. It's difficult taking surveys but not impossible.

Review.Titre: Found expired points
Review.Contenu: Found expired points, didn't realise, wish you'd warned me. Not been fully functional for a few months but must try harder from now on so doesnt happen againl

Review.Titre: Receive very less surveys.
Review.Contenu: Receive very less surveys.Some surveys after completing some portion, will stop in between saying you are not qualified.Takes months to earn a voucher.

Review.Titre: I cannot solve a questionnaire .When I…
Review.Contenu: I cannot solve a questionnaire .When I enter a questionnaire to solve it,it takes me out of it and this phrase appears"Can you believe it? We are currently out of surveys."

Review.Titre: It always disqualifies you
Review.Contenu: It always disqualifies you. Few surveys. And it keeps asking your personal info, like age, gender etc. I suggest you save all those info so you don’t have to repeatedly ask the same questions. It’s time consuming and tedious. And it would really help to explain what kind of  respondent you needed so we don’t have to waste our time answering bunch of questions for you to just disqualify us. Be better.

Review.Titre: Do Toluna think life's a gamble?
Review.Contenu: Overwhelming majority of survey invitations fail to connect successfully with whichever survey interface invitation appears to have been intended to link, usually resulting in messages perceived as errors, for example  "Oops, something went wrong", "We are sorry, an error has occurred with your survey", "It's not you it's us. Please try again", 504 error The request could not be satisfied", "504 gateway time out" or most commonly "Can you believe it? We're currently out of surveys...that match your profile"

Review.Titre: You won't make any money here.
Review.Contenu: There are very seldom surveys available and when they are you get bumped off right away.

Review.Titre: There will be dozens of "available"…
Review.Contenu: There will be dozens of "available" surveys when I log in. I'm surprised if one of those is capable of being completed every couple of days. My beef is not necessarily that I have very few rewardable surveys but that I get so many that I'm "not the group we're looking for". Your screening software is badly broken and I end up wasting a lot of time clicking on surveys that I can't even start.

Review.Titre: Bad action.
Review.Contenu: Several times I have tried to begin a survey after receiving a notice that new surveys were available and went to take one without success.  A notice would come up saying no surveys available.  Not good.

Review.Titre: Bad algorithm
Review.Contenu: Well, most of the offered surveys are taking initial information and suggesting it's not me, it happened 90% of my surveys

Review.Titre: Points given are very less for survey…
Review.Contenu: Points given are very less for survey and redemption points are more for less rewards

Review.Titre: Hot Air Balloons 000ooo00s
Review.Contenu: Encouraging people to join Toluna you offer Vouchers, ummh appealing. Problem when I finished my survey questions which was ok I was eager to see what I had earned. How complicated you make it with all the Zeros for points. An opening oneliner says Get ur £20 Voucher   Why don't you include the word WHEN after Voucher ? I also was left to decifer how many Zeros were in what category I had to get in to qualify. Come on be realistic why not just use a points system of 1- 50 or something? Not 100,000 qualified then novice 300000 master 500000 then trainee 10000 What a load of 00oo00 bubbles and underwater big puffs of nonsense. Nevermind hopefully the next survey I look at won't be written by the same writer as this one.

Review.Titre: Errors, Misleading Time Committment, and Few Points
Review.Contenu: I keep completing surveys that are much longer than promised (says 5 minutes, but actually take 20-25 minutes) and then AFTER I've completed it and hit Submit, I continually get errors and then are not credited with points. The points are abysmal for the amount of work required.

Review.Titre: Too many broken surveys
Review.Contenu: Too many broken surveys. Surveys that say 5 mins but take 25 mins. Too much rubbish in general. Rewards are low in comparison to others

Review.Titre: The surveys are low paying and most of…
Review.Contenu: The surveys are low paying and most of them tell you that you are not eligible for the survey midway which is a total waste of time. I have also recently noticed a decrease in number of surveys.

Review.Titre: You keep sending me opportunities to…
Review.Contenu: You keep sending me opportunities to take a survey, then say "Can you believe it? We're out of surveys!" That, of course, is a blatant lie. If I am not a suitable candidate for a survey, tell me that. Don't lie to me!

Review.Titre: Fun but not worth it
Review.Contenu: First time doing this. Actually quite good fun and cathartic in many ways. As it gets to know you, you end up giving opinions on things you actually like talking about. I answered some questions about a new car launch; said what a great car but it will fail because of ridiculous / embarrassing name ! Let's see if it has any effect ! BUT and its a big BUT - to earn any cash out of this (something useful rather than a single coffee or a sausage roll) would take weeks. To get to £35 for PayPal - an actual cashable reward - would probably take 5-6 days FULL time. So, not worth it really - unless you're bored.

Review.Titre: Keep clicking through and getting…
Review.Contenu: Keep clicking through and getting screen that says, "Oops, something went wrong, and it's our fault"Many surveys freeze and can't proceed when in the middle of it.A could I did used 20 minutes of my time, and right near the end, said "you don't qualify" instead of giving me 8000 points, I got 130! Angry at this and almost quit the service.

Review.Titre: I do all of these surveys that states will receive money or gift cards
Review.Contenu: I do all of these surveys that states I'm going to get 3000 points however ONLY receive a MERE 75 points.  To me that is false advertising.Also get half way through answering the questions THEN is stops it?????

Review.Titre: Toluna sends far too many emails that just waste time to respond to.
Review.Contenu: Toluna sends far too many emails and >95% of the time when I click on the the email it says can i believe it they are out of surveys? Yes I can believe it, they are a total waste of time!!!!

Review.Titre: I don't get enough surveys as compared…
Review.Contenu: I don't get enough surveys as compared to what I used to get earlier.

Review.Titre: Qualification and completion issues
Review.Contenu: This panel obviously does not use the profile data that they collected to pre-qualify participants when sending out survey invitations.  Otherwise, we would not have to attempt so many surveys before qualifying to complete one.  There are also far too many "Oops" messages which indicates a problem that they seem unable to fix.

Review.Titre: Why does it take 1 to 3 weeks to…
Review.Contenu: Why does it take 1 to 3 weeks to process a Paypal payout? 8 days now and still no reward. A site yesterday had my payout of 20 euro in my paypal account within 4 hours?? Its ridiculous.

Review.Titre: Takes to long to get a PayPal gift…
Review.Contenu: Takes to long to get a PayPal gift card, surveys are to low

Review.Titre: the redemption points seemed very low
Review.Contenu: the redemption points seemed very low, i.e. for paypal, will it really take me to earn 20,400 points before i get to redeem $10?  That seemed to be a lot of efforts to make....

Review.Titre: Too many times I don’t get picked for…
Review.Contenu: Too many times I don’t get picked for surveys so it’s not worth my time

Review.Titre: Delay or Unpaid Rewards
Review.Contenu: When I first started using Toluna it was great. I had no issues when claiming rewards for my points accrued. However, lately, I have had to contact them multiple times for missing rewards. A couple of times I just gave up because it was too onerous and I felt my peace of mind was not worth the $25 reward. This is a shame because I recommended them to various friends but at this point, I don't feel I can do that anymore.

Review.Titre: This site used to be a fun
Review.Contenu: This site used to be a fun, social way to take surveys, play some fun games and talk with people all over the world. After the site rehaul, it is now impossible to talk to anyone else on the site, the only way is an overly co fusing forum which is the opposite of user friendly. The last straw was when recently over half my points just disappeared on my birthday and I was told they had "expired" and that this was clearly posted....there was NOTHING posted on my page and that had literally never happened to me before and I've been using this site for at least 10yrs. I'm wondering whether it's worth staying now that that's happened on top of everything else. What a shame, it used to be such a great site and a reliable source of a fee extra bucks since I'm on disability.

Review.Titre: General grievance about points not allocated.
Review.Contenu: My grievance is not about "this time" but at least three previous occasions, when I feel I was taken advantage of (I don't believe it was intentional) with respect points not allocated. On One occasion I had spent a considerable amount of time doing the Nielsen survey (I had completed 4 or 5 sections) and when I clicked to do the next section, I was told that something had gone wrong, and it was your fault, not mine. I have received no points for that one. Not long after that, again I had spent much time doing a survey, which I thought I had completed, but when I clicked I was taken to the home page where the message said I didn't qualify for that survey.Poor form, guys.

Review.Titre: Not pairing surveys to clients
Review.Contenu: There isn't surveys that  accept me. How many times must I take 5 minutes filling out a requirement   survey, only to be knocked back, because of age, or some other excuse  why send me surveys I'm not right for.. waste of my time actually

Review.Titre: More surveys needed
Review.Contenu: Surveys are less. After filling in much of the information, questions - msg appears doesn't apply for you - waste of time.Adequate rewards need to be available

Review.Titre: Toluna low payback for time
Review.Contenu: The surveys are long and time consuming. The level of points you need to make to even get 5euro is alot of work.

Review.Titre: It’s very difficult at times to get a…
Review.Contenu: It’s very difficult at times to get a survey. Either it’s no longer available or I do not qualify.

Review.Titre: Number of survey I am getting are less
Review.Contenu: Number of survey I am getting are less. Sometimes survey is completed and money is not given. Sometimes half of survey is done or almost to completion and survey stops saying that this survey is full. How can this be possible in the middle of the survey??? Sometimes in the middle of survey it says you are not right candidate for this survey. Atleast in such situations it should pay half of money.

Review.Titre: Too much technical problems
Review.Contenu: Too much technical problems which are making the surveys replying bad, since you're coming to answer but suddenly an unexpected problem will come to stop you, and you're just gonna lost your time, since Toluna isn't giving you any consideration, even when you have proofs.I mean it's ok if it happens seldom, but they often have technical problems. Add the fact it's difficult to contact them for real, because they're replying with copy paste or a bot is doing so. If you finally get in touch with a real person, they're making their solutions pretty well, but not always.Also starting a survey for few minutes, and suddenly kicked out, don't bring you any points as a consideration for your work and time. Other survey websites are giving few points atleast even they disqualified you from a survey.The contest section is coming soon since more than a year. There are so many things to improve.

Review.Titre: It took me 10-15 minutes to go thru a…
Review.Contenu: It took me 10-15 minutes to go thru a pre-survey survey just to find out that I couldn't participate in said survey. This happened to me about 4 maybe 5 times.

Review.Titre: Often times I log in to do surveys…
Review.Contenu: Often times I log in to do surveys suggested for me and like today, I tried about a dozen but was only selected for one.  It is sad that I spend so much time but get almost nowhere.  Wish the site/platform worked better

Review.Titre: Frustrating
Review.Contenu: Most times if I respond to an email, I answer questions only to be told you are "looking for a different profile."I have to search and get turned down several times (2-3) before I actually get to participate in a survey--and for less points that the email stated as a CTA.Sometimes, you answer questions, get redirected, answer some more questions and find out you are not actually doing the survey. And, then, the survey takes MUCH longer than estimated.

Review.Titre: Payment system are so disgusting
Review.Contenu: Payment system are so disgusting. They paid late via paypal

Review.Titre: Recently most of the surveys
Review.Contenu: Recently most of the surveys, I attempted got closed due to overquota at the end.. If the required numbers is achieved, then closed the survey initially rather than allowing people to come in and terminate at the end.. Such a waste if time & effort

Review.Titre: Either I start a survey and it decides…
Review.Contenu: Either I start a survey and it decides part wsy in it’s not suitable.Or I get constant reminders to take a survey and it either says there are none or there is an error try later. Worst is spending 10 mins then getting oops something went wrong!!!

Review.Titre: Frustrated
Review.Contenu: I have become extremely frustrated with Toluna surveys because sometimes I have spent several minutes filling in the survey when it suddenly stops and goes to the home page saying they have enough. Sometimes the error page appears while I am part way through a survey.

Review.Titre: The surveys are regular and rewarding
Review.Contenu: The surveys are regular and rewarding. However the surveys frequently have an error code and cannot be completed therefore no reward. Occurs at any stage of the survey. Most annoying waste of time.

Review.Titre: The site is very hit and miss
Review.Contenu: The site is very hit and miss. You can nearly finish a task and it kicks you out so unfortunately it’s then costing you time. But, if you’re bored it’s worth a go, you will not earn many points unless you sit on here all day and even then it wouldn’t be great.

Review.Titre: I have faced several issues
Review.Contenu: I have faced several issues, recently my 3450 points deducted without any prior notice . In many surveys after successfully completing i didn't get points and this happened every month. Surveys do come but not get qualified after giving honest opinions.

Review.Titre: Dearth of surveys…
Review.Contenu: Most of the time there are no surveys or there are none after one. It is a little frustrating, plus some of the surveys don't key on interesting or 'important' topics.

Review.Titre: The surveys are not user friendly
Review.Contenu: The surveys are not user friendly. They are very complicated and have no or incomplete directions for completing the process. I spent almost a half hour on the last survey and was not able to complete it. What a waste of time!

Review.Titre: Frustrating
Review.Contenu: Very frustrating for me. It constantly is redirecting me and then it constantly says oops sorry there’s a problem. It doesn’t happen when I do anything else but only when I’m on Tulena

Review.Titre: No reward for time
Review.Contenu: You waste our time with too many questions and then you screen us out with no reward for the considerable time spent

Review.Titre: Annoying survey
Review.Contenu: You survey end most time when I am filling my survey form and pop-up windows come this survey form is full.

Review.Titre: You rarely allow me to take any…
Review.Contenu: You rarely allow me to take any surveys.  Half the time you say there aren't any to take, the other 45% you disqualify me.

Review.Titre: I am trying to get an access code to…
Review.Contenu: I am trying to get an access code to redeem points. I am instructed what to do but still no success.  You should establish another way to get codeTestAutomated phone call.I am sure I am not the only person having trouble...I do nt receive an access code for redemption of points

Review.Titre: inquiry #1339062
Review.Contenu: Few days ago, I sent a query to your Toluna team for the 1st time, asking if you guys know the Lazada e-voucher (Rewards) might still be available for redemption in near/ distant future... cause I notice it's been 'out-of-stock' for around a month already.If YES, I'd continue to wait as I wish to buy some higher-priced items from Lazada and get a discount. If NO, I'd just redeem others such as Fairprice supermarket e-voucher.Yet, the disappointing response reads like a templated reply without answering my question at all, or any indication if Lazada might cease to be 1 of the redemption-partners in future (for example). Not helpful at all, as my query remains un-answered.The original response to my inquiry #1339062: "Thank you for submitting your request!To see how you can spend your Toluna points, please visit the Rewards section after logging into your account - you will see here the entire list of rewards available to choose from once you have earned enough points to redeem."

Review.Titre: Lack of concern or assistance by them
Review.Contenu: Not only did my surveys crash out (again) but when I requested a fix and explained that it was their end they statedthat they could do nothing and that I should fix it.  They have now made the fix, after I had given my remainder points away and was about to close my account.

Review.Titre: Started very well but !
Review.Contenu: Started very well but for a long time now I keep being screened out , sometimes after I have been doing the survey for some time. It is now taking me far too long to get enough points to cash out .I can try several surveys on after the other and get nothing for my time. Allso some are taking much longer to complete than it says it will.

Review.Titre: They have interesting surveys but after…
Review.Contenu: They have interesting surveys but after completing more than 80- 90% of the survey they do not recognize the answers claiming that the profile does not apply. I

Review.Titre: Unable to take surveys
Review.Contenu: I have attempted to take several surveys..and unable to do Either survey filled up or. do not meet targeted requirements

Review.Titre: These survey companies are just not…
Review.Contenu: These survey companies are just not paying what my time is worth anymore. I used to do these 20 years ago and the pay was much better. Prices are sky high right now. And this is my thought, if I do not give my time away at work for less than $20 an hour, what makes you think on my time off from work I will just want to freely give up that time to you for less than minimum wage pay per hour. This pay just does not add up to much of anything anymore!

Review.Titre: Time wastage before being linked to an available survey
Review.Contenu: The surveys are straight forward and easy however, many times alot of time is wasted as after answering multiple questions, the page goes to "sorry...can you believe it? We are out of surveys at this time". Bullocks!

Review.Titre: Promised 9000 points if I completed a…
Review.Contenu: Promised 9000 points if I completed a survey in addition to the points from the survey as I had not done one for a while. I completed the survey Toluca did not supply the points.

Review.Titre: Surveys are poor quality
Review.Contenu: Surveys are poor qualityDifficult to take when using a mobile phone.Have checked my IP address thoroughlyand found nothing wrong.However. Toluna still say something is wrong with my IP address.Sometimes survey you end up taking is not theoriginal survey you entered.Toluna survey is the only one I have problem accessing with my laptop.

Review.Titre: I have no idea what I'm writing this…
Review.Contenu: I have no idea what I'm writing this about. Toluna didn't include in the email a reminder of what help I was requesting. For that reason, I'm giving 3 stars for an average rating. I do, however, know that just before I'm able to redeem, I don't seem to qualify for any surveys that are emailed to me. I get turned away before I can answer even one  question. I make sure that my profile is always updated. So if I'm being sent surveys that are a good match for my profile, how come I'm disqualified before I can answer any questions at all? Anyway, I keep trying.

Review.Titre: Number of surveys I have done but…
Review.Contenu: Number of surveys I have done but always it as unfortunately you are not eligible for this survey. After spending about 10 minutes or 15 minutes means it's really harsh. Atleast for participating or for spending time , you to provide some points

Review.Titre: I have had several fail towards the…
Review.Contenu: I have had several fail towards the end. I have also spent several minutes answering questions only to be rejected. Surely some of this xould be kept on file

Review.Titre: I love the surveys, but...
Review.Contenu: I love the surveys. However, about 33% crash near the end and I never receive credit for them. This frustrates me to know when after spending nearly 20 minutes doing a survey. I answered them honestly and with lots of thought. The least you can do is make sure they all work properly. Some of them tell me that I have a non-standard browser, yet it is running in the Toluna app. I just don't get it.

Review.Titre: Most of the questions in the survey…
Review.Contenu: Most of the questions in the survey seem unclear and unrelated to the topics.I also encountered after finished the survey and while waiting for my reward the whole page hanged

Review.Titre: I love it when it works
Review.Contenu: I love it when it works, but I seem to be able to get very few surveys. I can go several days without qualifying. It would be 5 stars if I could get in with any regularity.

Review.Titre: i like the surveys
Review.Contenu: i like the surveys; usually available; what i don't like is that when the survey is currently cut without any credit points even having answered several questions already

Review.Titre: The wait is over
Review.Contenu: I was waiting for so long to get a survey and long is I mean like 3 months, ended up, I just needed to update my profile and after I did, I was able to receive surveys to add up to my points. Though there are still times that I have so many surveys on my dashboard, still message prompts appear that I do not have any surveys. Confusing.

Review.Titre: The rewards are very low
Review.Contenu: The rewards are very low. You have to complete atleast 15 surveys to earn ₹200, that works out to less ₹13 per survey. Further you saw the profile doesn't fit after completing more than 50% of the survey.

Review.Titre: Okay to kill time.
Review.Contenu: Dislike that invote links only connect to designated survey about 50% of the time.Disllike that points for survey completion take too long to be credited and sometimes are not.Like survey opportunities.

Review.Titre: Great content
Review.Contenu: Great content, easy UX/UI and good compensation package. However, could be frustrating at times due to redundancy of screener questions only to miss or not qualify for a survey. Also, they should add more payment mode other than Paypal.

Review.Titre: Qualify vs Errors
Review.Contenu: I feel like as soon as I start a survey. It immediately closes out because I don't qualify. Or once I start one it will turn around and tell me that there was there an error.

Review.Titre: Every survey I have tried to take…
Review.Contenu: Every survey I have tried to take kicked me out and said it was an error on your part. Frustrating, which is why I quit doing surveys from you in the past. Hopefully it improves

Review.Titre: It’s frustrating to waste hours of time…
Review.Contenu: It’s frustrating to waste hours of time answering survey questions only to get told I don’t qualify. They have my profile and suggest surveys, I answer 40 questions and then don’t qualify. It feels like a huge waste of time

Review.Titre: Most was ok but found sometimes forced…
Review.Contenu: Most was ok but found sometimes forced to put a certain number of responses when I did not agree with enough of the answers. Therefore, my answer was untrue.

Review.Titre: It is sad to see most surveys that are…
Review.Contenu: It is sad to see most surveys that are more of value you don't get a chance to a attempt.Good part is many surveys are available regularly

Review.Titre: Screened out due to age?
Review.Contenu: Recently I have gone days without qualifying for any surveys, I suspect that I may be being screened out due to my age, which in my opinion is nonsense.

Review.Titre: Many glitches in the beginning
Review.Contenu: When I started there were so many glitches it was maddening.  When a page would load it would “wrap”, meaning the columns weren’t lined up and it was extremely difficult to follow, I would get error messages, pages wouldn’t come up and more. Tonight was the first time everything went smoothly!  Yay!

Review.Titre: poor matching
Review.Contenu: All too often I get almost all the way through a survey only to be told I don't qualify, this is a waste of my time. Surely you have enough information on me to better match surveys to me, often you invite only to tell me after no questions that I dont match, again why send them if I don't match.

Review.Titre: Should have stuck with the previous portal
Review.Contenu: I have been a member of this survey panel for more than 10 years.  Until recently I was totally satisfied with the amount and topics of the surveys I was receiving.  I do not like the new portal, I prefer the previous portal where you could see the survey topics, time of completion and reward points.  In this new portal, one just has to take pot luck as to the topic you are assigned under each group of priority, quick and premium surveys, often wasting my time trying a survey that is not relevant to my profile.I do hope that Toluna sees this review and seriously considers my constructive criticism of its new portal.

Review.Titre: Really long survey with no forewarning…
Review.Contenu: Really long survey with no forewarning and no way to track how far along you are. Not bad, but that was distressing. I also wish there were less personal questions and it was more about opinion. I know demographics matter but I’d really rather not share that with a site I don’t know or trust yet.

Review.Titre: Redemption of rewards rakes too much…
Review.Contenu: Redemption of rewards rakes too much time and not a transparent policy, further no points are been issued against surveys completed by me.

Review.Titre: Until today every time I clicked a link…
Review.Contenu: Until today every time I clicked a link to take a survey I got an error "It's not you it's us".  I was ready to unsubscribe when I finally got through today.

Review.Titre: and repeat!
Review.Contenu: Too often Toluna lists many 10-minute surveys, that turn out to be the same--have opened up to ten sometimes!Waste of time and energy for me, not helpful to Toluna.  There may be a survey available of value to us both, but I leave the site without finding it.  This is a relatively new annoyance, and I hope it goes away.  Otherwise I will probably unsubscribe.

Review.Titre: You can fill in half a survey but not get any points for it again don't meet the type of people they want.
Review.Contenu: I think the instructions are printed too small,  it isn't well explained why the questions aren't moving on when you have made a mistake it isn't easy to see where.  You have often spent a while filling in the questionnaire just to receive a "sorry we are looking for a different demographic " so you don't receive any points, or " sorry it's not you it's us " message.

Review.Titre: I don’t like that it takes so long to…
Review.Contenu: I don’t like that it takes so long to get your reward once you’ve earned it. I don’t like that I almost complete many of your surveys and then am told I don’t qualify or that the survey is full. This happens too often.

Review.Titre: don't cut offf from surveys mid way when im answering correctly
the connection to a sruvey
Review.Contenu: The main problem I do have so far, is to get the chance to do a survey, since my IP is often blocked by your system.   Once I can get to a survey, everything is fine.

Review.Titre: Resetting of password disabled: When I could not login using the…
Review.Contenu: When I could not login using the password and I am unable to login until now. And I am not allowed to reset the password too.

Review.Titre: I like Toluna because it gives bigger…
Review.Contenu: I like Toluna because it gives bigger points compare to other survey sites but please inform just immediately if we are not suitable to a survey, most of the times I already answered a lot but at the end it will say that I am not suitable. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Liked the overall Website
Review.Contenu: Liked the overall Website. But most of the time it happens that we complete whole survey but at the end when the answers are submitted, we got the message of rejection. After spending so much time, it makes us very much upset that we get late rejection.

Review.Titre: Not always honest
Review.Contenu: I find it very annoying to enter my details and then be asked for them again if accepted for a survey.  It i also annoying to seem that you have been accepted and then told you don't meet the criteria

Review.Titre: I do not qualify for a lot of surveys…
Review.Contenu: I do not qualify for a lot of surveys being a little bit older and not having kids at home

Review.Titre: It's ok
Review.Contenu: It matched me with a good experience but the ad said a 100 dollars for completed survey Wich I did not get😐

Review.Titre: Most surveys make you waste several…
Review.Contenu: Most surveys make you waste several minutes of your time before dumping you out as "not required spec", at least you get a few points for them now. Have had several that have gone full time only to fail on last page and no points added to total...this needs addressing. Overall, this is mainly going to be a software fault. The site itself is easily accessible, easy to navigate and worth the effort when you do get enough points to claim a gift. Score of 3/5 reflects personal experience with content.

Review.Titre: What I dislike about this company is that the points don't show up.
Review.Contenu: What I dislike about this company is that when I do surveys, I don't see the points from that survey that was just completed.

Review.Titre: Invitations to not-relevant surveys
Review.Contenu: I am often invited to do a survey and after answering a number of questions I am told I am not eligible . This is in spite of giving information in my profile. It means I have just wasted my time.

Review.Titre: The survey is hard for me to understand…
Review.Contenu: The survey is hard for me to understand even if it's translated in pilipino word. The question is so hard. Asking some basic information then. It will say the survey doesn't fits you. Why didn't you survey about groceries product or fast food chain like McDonald's what the experience or do you try this product what's will rate for this.

Review.Titre: Not one of the best survey sites
Review.Contenu: Often find half way through surveys you are screened out . Wasting a lot of time. It also takes a lot of surveys to get cash back

Review.Titre: Not as good as it was.
Review.Contenu: The points are useful for paying for my cell phone, however, I am not getting as many surveys as I used to and I am being screen out of more.

Review.Titre: For no apparent reason I was stopped…
Review.Contenu: For no apparent reason I was stopped from doing any surveys for several months due to being "flagged" due to no fault by me, according to your investigation.Making content is no longer easy since a major changes to the sight last year.

Review.Titre: A dynamic site, but reward redemption has changed for the worse
Review.Contenu: I've been a member of this site for many years and enjoyed it. Reward levels are challenging to reach, but it's a friendly, playful environment. However, about a year ago I ordered my usual Paypal reward it was rejected, saying it 'couldn't go through,' even though I don't have this problem with any other rewards site I belong to. So I use the Amazon reward instead now. I find this suspect, and so I can't rate this site very high for trustworthiness in this regard.

Review.Titre: the reward system means that you would…
Review.Contenu: the reward system means that you would have to spend hours just for a £5 reward. Not sure if it's worth my time.

Review.Titre: Toluna reviews
Review.Contenu: Toluna is better than many of the review sites and many are interesting while enabling a reward in terms of points which are then transferable. Though you still get the odd survey that you provide information only to be informed that it has closed or your input is not relevant it is rare compared with other survey sites.Overal Toluna is my preferred site of this nature.

Review.Titre: Opportunity for improvement
Review.Contenu: Opportunity for improvement I have accessed several surveys within a hour of launch and after answering a few questions, it says it full/closed.  Why keep it available

Review.Titre: Survey couldn’t be finished as it went…
Review.Contenu: Survey couldn’t be finished as it went into error

Review.Titre: Surveys are not available and payment…
Review.Contenu: Surveys are not available and payment is to low other websites pay me far better than this and on toluna we get easily disqualified multiple times but not on other websites

Review.Titre: I've had a lot of trouble with surveys…
Review.Contenu: I've had a lot of trouble with surveys closing or just stopping after almost finishing them and then not getting credit for them

Review.Titre: I like Toluna except that I am screened…
Review.Contenu: I like Toluna except that I am screened out of far too many surveys and often have to do a significant amount of work to reach the point of being screened out - it is very frustrating and it is worse at the weekend. The amount of time I spend working on surveys before I am allowed to complete one is often much longer than the time a successful survey takes and for my wasted time the company shows no material appreciation...It therefore isn't possible to take a quick dip and complete a couple of surveys as a change from other work. It means I have to set aside significant time and be prepared to waste it and be frustrated. Today I must have been screened out of half a dozen or more plus one that had closed and one that had filled up. It can be very frustrating, but other panels usually don't make panellists suffer in that way - maybe their algorithms are better...

Review.Titre: I Completed the Last Survey Fully on…
Review.Contenu: I Completed the Last Survey Fully on the Subject of the National Lottery but was not Rewarded with any Points. This was a 20 Minute Survey too. Not Good.

Review.Titre: get lots of invites but surveys do not…
Review.Contenu: get lots of invites but surveys do not apply to me.

Review.Titre: Daily email recieved
Review.Contenu: Daily email recieved , supposedly aimed at my profile. Clicked in and had a load of pre questions to complete before being advised the survey is either not suitable or full up,  this typically takes as long as the advertised time for the survey.When you do get a survey they tend to be easy to complete and rewards added . Haven’t cashed any rewards yet as haven’t checked that process yet

Review.Titre: Sometimes you don't get your points…
Review.Contenu: Sometimes you don't get your points even though you completed the survey until the end. It's a bit frustrating

Review.Contenu: Only 1 out of 5 survey invitations go through till end to  get points. Most of the surveys do not work.  Toluna committee should ensure, that based on the profile, all surveys should work till end to gain the points. Otherwise it is discouraging.

Review.Contenu: I get really annoyed when I complete a survey and receive a "your profile does not fit this current survey" or similar wording. Had it happen a few times now so its not a one off. If my profile does not fit the current survey TELL ME BEFORE I START IT. I'm 77 and after the points and don't need my time wasted.

Review.Contenu: Surveys sent are not suitable matches and I get disqualified every time.

Review.Contenu: Collecting points is a long tedious process.More points should be awarded per survey.I think that Lifepoints is the leader in suveys

When complete a survey properly they said your point will be credited soon...but last 3 days ( 04/12/23,  05/12/23, 06/12/23) each an every surve comleated ( 8 survey complete)  by me...all the point are pending. Can any one tell me this.. Profile issue... Or Toluna website issue.

Review.Contenu: I keep get a message after taking a survey "its not your fault its ours ,something went wrong.I had trouble getting 2 vouchers I ordered ,it took about a month to sort out.

Review.Titre: I enjoy the surveys given to me as I…
Review.Contenu: I enjoy the surveys given to me as I relate to most of the products. What I dont like is the frequent technical glitches and the prompt of ineligibility to the survey after spending 20 minutes or more in the survey.

Review.Titre: Good when you can actually complete a survey...
Review.Contenu: I start so many surveys that I then get locked out of - survey full, don't meet the criteria etc etc. Can be 5 or more surveys in a row and it gets tiresome. Toluna need to do more selective offerings based on the personal profile.

Review.Titre: I am like toluna platform.but toluna…

Review.Contenu: Dislike.Being directed to the page with a man scratching his head saying, “It’s not you it’s us”.

Review.Contenu: This was the first or maybe second survey I completed.  I get turned down for almost all surveys.  I probably won't do many more since my odds of taking a survey are only about 1 chance in 20.

Review.Titre: Good, but can be annoying
Review.Contenu: A lot of the surveys I have done recently have gone all the way through then when I press finish it says error, also it is very annoying when you get halfway or more through a survey and it stops and says the survey is full

Review.Titre: Toluna Experience
Review.Contenu: Easy and doable surveys but a slow flow and reward system.

Review.Contenu: I had a bad experience for the last 4 months due to every survey I started give me an error message. "Sorry there is an error". "Ops it not you but us". I tried every day for 4 months with no success.

Review.Titre: All goods
Review.Contenu: All goods, and I hope my points credited in my balance, until now its pending.

Review.Titre: REWARDS
Review.Contenu: In my first to second month the payment processing is great, like you will receive your earnings about 5 days up to 7 days but after 5 months the process of rewards are too long like 4 weeks, and yet they can process the rewards for just about 5 to days. Right?

Review.Contenu: Most of the time when I access surveys there are no more available which is frustrating.

Review.Titre: Toluna

Review.Titre: Sometimes after answer more than 70…

Review.Contenu: It's good if you don’t get locked out! I have many times spent 15 mins on a survey to suddenly be told that they have reached their limit on survey takers. It’s time wasting and also infuriating. I even wrote to them and got nowhere. They don’t even offer some consolation points to thank you for your time. Otherwise the surveys are good

Review.Titre: Your site will show several available…

Review.Titre: The company survey is always smooth i…
Review.Contenu: The company survey is always smooth i hardly experience interruption .point giving once finished. But i have problem with redemption, it take too long to  to receive money in paypal. You should work on that on that , at least once money is approved let it be received that or at worst 5 days. If that is applied it will encourage people to work harder, when they know it wont take long before they receive their money

Review.Titre: giving them 4stars cause i get a good…
Review.Contenu: giving them 4stars cause i get a good amount of easy and non-complicated surveys unlike other survey sites. the points they give for each survey is great making it quicker to earn points to redeem. to anyone looking for a survey site that pays out right away, toluna isn't the one for you. the redemption actually takes 3 weeks to reflect on your paypal which is quite long but you can always keep earning points while you wait

Review.Titre: Great experience
Review.Contenu: Great experience! Registration to Toluna is completely free - Not only will you never be asked to pay, but just by answering surveys and engaging in fun community activities like content and games, you will earn points that can be exchanged for vouchers and cash payments.Had received multiple payout already but sometimes surveys quite long.

Review.Titre: Team surveys
Review.Contenu: Surveys were interactive, unique. The time spent in putting my thought to enhance the customer thought process, marketing and economic growth was encouraging.New products were a kickstart 4 me to engage & maintain this relation with TOLUNA.Rewards did make a difference in my account. The team support was encouraging.

Review.Titre: Advice From an 80 Year Old Geezer Still Movin' It
Review.Contenu: One should aleways thrive to learn, maintain and always rremember as much as they can because it is never known that a particular knowledge might come in as important and needful.  It lies there in the back of your brain waiting until it will be called on.  When I went back to college, everything I thought I forgot was actually still there - it just needed a little flavoring.

Review.Titre: Toluna is BY FAR, HANDS DOWN, the BEST online survey options there is out there!!!
Review.Contenu: Toluna is one of my absolute FAVORITE survey sights!! The surveys Toluna offers are pretty much the best all the way around when it comes to the numerous survey sights that I am a member of and that I participate on a daily basis. The variety of surveys as well as the length of them keep me entertained, engaged, and just overall satisfied while participating in each and every one :) I am also particularly fond of the points system and the rewards that are earned in that points system. They offer a wide variety of gift cards with numerous  categories to chose from, including restaurants and coffee shops like The Cheesecake Factory and Starbucks, chain fast food restaurants like McDonald's, Burger King, and ChicFilA. Big department stores like Walmart and Target. Even grocery stores including Kroger, as well as online shopping options like Amazon and reloadable virtual visa/MasterCard gift cards. Toluna even offers cash out options so you can transfer your points and turn it into immediate cash like PayPal (which of course consists of a few more points needed to earn this option, but totally worth it in my opinion!!) So all and all, Toluna, by far, is one of the best survey sights around and I highly recommend them as my number one and first choice if you are looking to join and  participate in this kind of online extra cash gig!! Each of their surveys are enjoyable and does not bore you into not even finishing. Keep you excited and engaged the entire time. It also educated you in all types of subjects. Thanks Toluna!! You all are seriously the BEST!!
